DOC.brief_title: Comparative Volumetric Assessment Alveolar Ridge Preservation Utilizing Different Bone Grafting Materials
DOC.criteria: 1 . Provision inform consent 2 . ≥ 18 year ≤ 75 year 3 . Good physical health ( ASAI/II ) 4 . Extraction maxillary premolar , canine incisor , mandibular premolar canine require 5 . Teeth adjacent ( mesial distal ) study site must consist two stable natural teeth minimal restoration , without sign periodontal bone loss ( > 3 mm ) and/or significant soft tissue deficiencies 1 . Buccal plate dehiscence and/or fenestration > 3mm study site follow extraction 2 . Untreated rampant caries uncontrolled periodontal disease 3 . Inadequate oral hygiene ( estimate plaque score > 20 % ) 4 . Smokers use 10 cigarette equivalent per day 5 . Smokeless tobacco use ecigarette use 6 . Compromised physical health and/or uncontrolled severe systemic disease include : ASA III/IV Metabolic bone disease History malignancy History radiotherapy chemotherapy malignancy past 5 year History autoimmune disease Longterm steroidal antibiotic therapy Uncontrolled diabetes Known alcohol drug abuse 7 . Systemic local disease condition would compromise postoperative heal 8 . Use substance medication influence bone metabolism 9 . Known pregnancy 10 .
